metadata.Title: CVE-2023-47234 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in FRRouting FRR through 9.0.1. A crash can occur when processing a crafted BGP UPDATE message with a MP_UNREACH_NLRI attribute and additional NLRI data (that lacks mandatory path attributes).

notes.Note: sbeattie> the quagga project was renamed to frr

criterions.comment: frr package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
quagga package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
